choices: Leave the cave to go get help
1.content:
You enter the dark entrance of the cave. Your name is Thelma. You have a boyfriend, Roy. He is coming with you on the cave trip. The other members are called: Cliff, Jill, Ron and Maurine.
The cave you enter is very dark and gloomy, the only light coming from your helmet light. It illuminates everything in front of you, the wall of the cave, the stalagmites and stalactites. Soon enough, you all decide to split up. You and Jill go together and the other four go together. You and Jill wonder around, fascinated by the wonders that await you.
Eventually, you stumble upon a peculiar rock. It is blue and has sharp, jagged edges. You decide to put it in you're bag. You walk around a little more, until Jill interrupts your quiet tour. "stop!" she instructs. And you halt.
"what is it?" you ask, intrigued.
"the stone's moving." Jill replies.
"but how can it be moving?" you wonder. Jill approachesit slowly and cautiously. She picks it up in her hands.
A few seconds later you hear screams. Her screams.
You turn around and she has stumbled off the edge of a cliff right next to them. Her face appears to be bloody, as if it has been torn off.
You run for the others in fear. Your breathing is becoming harsher. "roy!" you bellow. Your voice echoes around the cave.
"we're coming!" a reply comes a couple of seconds later. You suddenly stumble over a rock and you burst into tears.
The others come to you. "what happened?" Roy asks.
"jill's fallen!" you reply.

What do you do?
1.title: Entrance

choices: Run down the tunnel next to you
11.content:
You all climb down on your ropes and go to inspect Jill. She seems to be unconscious.
You choose to lift her up on a stretcher.
You all decide that Burt should go up and winch the ropes for the stretcher.
He goes up and lifts the stretcher up, carrying her to a safe place before finally helping the others at the edge to climb back up.
While he does this, a creature bursts violently out of Jill's head, coming out of her eye. The eyeball drops off it as it opens it's huge mouth and hisses loudly.
Burt turns round in wonder, only to be immeadiately faced with a quick as lightning creature racing toward his neck.
He reaches out to stop it, but too late, as it is already on his neck and advancing it's retractable teeth into the flesh.
Burt screams in pain, alerting the others. They watch him tumble down the cliff, only to be stopped by a rope that has caught on his leg.
The alien digs further, snapping his spine with it's pressure filled bite. And it is then that his head starts to slip off, slowly. It finally comes off, dropping to the ground. You stare at the upright head, part of the helmet smashed.
11.title: Go down and inspect Jill

12.content:
You begin to leave the cave with all the others, but your progress is halted when your headlight suddenly switches off. You go behind the others so you can find your way.
But in the gloom just behind them, you see a silhouetted figure leap up at Roy. The others hear his screams and you and the others come to his aid. And suddenly, it jumps for you...
12.title: Leave the cave to go get help

info.brief_description: You go into a cave with a group of five others. But an alien starts killing them off...
info.description:
A group of six speleologists(cave explorers) go into a cave. But one of them falls off a cliff when a strange blue rock erupts and something bursts out... The others have to decide what to do.

This is what the alien looks like(the one that comes out of the rock):
Pink in colour, skin the texture of meat, a small main body about ome meter wide with three tentacles connected. There are teeth inside the tentacles for killing people.

If you are going to kill someone off, these are deaths I recommend:
eye bitten out,
face ripped off,
neck torn out,
head ripped off.(by alien going inside neck)
You can change any of these deaths slightly if you like.
Also, the alien can go inside people and control them. When the alien is ready to come out, it explodes the person's, head.
